chunks.zh: 大家有和岳父起过冲突吗？
chunks.en: Has anyone had conflicts with their father-in-law?

chunks.zh: 岳父是小学老师，今年过来我们这过年，来的时候从家里带来了许多腊肠、腊肉，来到之后又在年前炸了好多酥肉，全部放到冰箱里，加上他又爱下厨做饭，于是乎天天吃的差不多都是这些肉。
chunks.en: My father-in-law is a primary school teacher. He came to spend the Lunar New Year with us this year, bringing a lot of sausages and cured meat from his home. After arriving, he also deep-fried a lot of crispy pork before the New Year, all of which was put in the refrigerator. Plus, he loves to cook, so we've been eating mostly these meats every day.

chunks.zh: 除夕那天中午，是在外边吃的饭，在点了不少肉菜之外，还点了份生菜，然后岳父见了执意要求点多一份“青菜”，理由是年夜饭一定要有“青菜”，而生菜不属于青菜，因为不是十字花科的，最后吃剩了好多，于是打包回去，还说“年年有余”。
chunks.en: On Lunar New Year's Eve, we had lunch outside. In addition to ordering a lot of meat dishes, we also ordered a lettuce salad. My father-in-law insisted on ordering another 'green vegetable' dish, because Lunar New Year's Eve dinner must have 'green vegetables,' and lettuce doesn't count because it's not a cruciferous vegetable. In the end, a lot was left over, so we packed it up and took it home, saying 'May there be surpluses every year.'

chunks.zh: 年初一一起出去玩，在景点那有提供纸笔墨给游客写福字的摊位，岳父于是上去写了几幅带回来，后来我才知道，他写一幅「……家和万事兴……家衰败三代」字带回来贴在家里，我看了后觉得年初一贴这个不爽，但没说什么。
chunks.en: On the first day of the Lunar New Year, we went out to play together. There were stalls at the scenic spot providing paper, brushes, and ink for tourists to write the character 福 (fú, fortune). My father-in-law went up and wrote a few and brought them back. Later, I found out that he had written and brought back a couplet that said, '...Family harmony brings prosperity... Family decline for three generations' to paste at home. I felt uncomfortable pasting this on the first day of the Lunar New Year, but I didn't say anything.

chunks.zh: 今早我和太太送他去探亲戚，在路上，他说「今天晚上九点多是立春，要〔躲春〕，到时不要外出，不要说话，把手机关机」，我听了不太爽，但当时也没说什么。
chunks.en: This morning, my wife and I took him to visit relatives. On the way, he said, 'Tonight at 9 PM is the Beginning of Spring, so we need to 'hide from spring.' Don't go out at that time, don't talk, and turn off your cell phones.' I didn't feel good about it, but I didn't say anything at the time.

chunks.zh: 回来之后，我和太太就表达了吃太多加工肉制品以及吃剩菜的不好，以及「躲春」这是封建迷信，希望她能提醒一下他爸。
chunks.en: After returning home, my wife and I expressed our concerns about eating too many processed meat products and leftovers, as well as the fact that 'hiding from spring' is a feudal superstition, and hoped that she could remind her father.

chunks.zh: 结果我太太十分生气，觉得是我在挑他爸的刺，当时我情绪也上来了，于是后来她干脆把我说的发到共同的群里，细数我的不对，晚上又是一顿争吵。
chunks.en: As a result, my wife was very angry and felt that I was picking on her dad. My emotions flared up at that time, so she simply posted what I said in our shared group, listing all my faults, and we had another argument that night.

chunks.zh: 请问各位 v 友，你们有和岳父起过冲突吗，都是处理的，多谢!
chunks.en: Dear V2EX users, have you ever had conflicts with your father-in-law, and how did you handle them? Thanks!

chunks.zh: 你太太处事有问题，她应该调和矛盾，不是激化矛盾。
chunks.en: Your wife has a problem with how she handles things. She should be mediating the conflict, not exacerbating it.

chunks.zh: 另外，老人爱干什么就干什么吧，说了也不会听的，非大是大非，都顺着来
chunks.en: Also, let the older people do what they like to do. They won't listen anyway. Unless it involves major issues, just go along with it.

chunks.zh: 你老婆情商也低，跟我老婆一样。。。
chunks.en: Your wife has low EQ, just like mine...

chunks.zh: 哈哈 去年经济上有点压力，我老婆好心介绍她表哥跟我联系，说带着我们赚点钱，帮我们渡过难关。
chunks.en: Haha. Last year, we had some financial pressure, and my wife kindly introduced her cousin to me, saying that he would take us to make some money and help us get through the difficulties.

chunks.zh: 她哥搞了一个厂子，说什么光伏项目，跟合伙人从银行贷了 2000w ，等厂子弄好，号称可以立马转手卖给政府，至少翻四倍，暗示是政府内部人的白手套项目，关系全部打理好了。。。
chunks.en: Her cousin started a factory, talking about a photovoltaic project, and borrowed 20 million from the bank with his partners. He claimed that once the factory was built, it could be immediately sold to the government, at least quadrupling the investment, implying that it was a white-glove project for government insiders and that all the connections had been taken care of...

chunks.zh: 说我可以参与下，回头就能赚很多。
chunks.en: He said that I could participate and make a lot of money in return.

chunks.zh: 我一听这种项目就傻逼，逻辑都不能自洽，都从银行搞到 4000w 了？
chunks.en: When I heard about this kind of project, I thought it was stupid. The logic didn't even make sense. They already got 40 million from the bank?

chunks.zh: 带我赚钱，我真要投，我投多少？
chunks.en: If they want to lead me to make money, and I really want to invest, how much should I invest?

chunks.zh: 这么厉害，如果是真想帮我们，先借 20w 给我们，说不着急还，等有闲钱了再还我们。
chunks.en: If they're so good, if they really want to help us, they should lend us 200,000 first, saying that we don't need to rush to pay it back, and we can pay it back when we have spare money.

chunks.zh: 但是出于礼貌我还是比较客气跟他哥聊了很久，表达了感谢哥哥能在我们困难的时候想到我们带我们赚钱。。。
chunks.en: But out of politeness, I was still quite polite and chatted with her cousin for a long time, expressing my gratitude that my cousin thought of us and took us to make money during our difficult times...

chunks.zh: 然后我假模假样询问大概需要我投多少钱？
chunks.en: Then I pretended to ask how much money I would need to invest?

chunks.zh: 她哥意思先投 200 万.... 哈哈哈。。。
chunks.en: Her cousin meant to invest 2 million first... Hahaha...

chunks.zh: 我本来还想着看哥哥这么热情，我投个 2 万当学费学习了解下这里面的门道。
chunks.en: I was originally thinking of investing 20,000 as tuition to learn about the inside information, seeing that her cousin was so enthusiastic.

chunks.zh: 结果上来跟我说 200 万，真是太看得起我了。。哈哈。
chunks.en: As a result, he came up to me and said 2 million, which is too kind of him, haha.

chunks.zh: 然后我说我刚买完房子，身上现金不足 30 万就。。。
chunks.en: Then I said that I just bought a house and had less than 300,000 in cash left...

chunks.zh: 然后她哥开始跟我谆谆教导‌成功人士要学会利用规则撬动杠杆，意思我可以先想办法贷出 200 万，不出 1 年。。。。
chunks.en: Then her cousin began to earnestly teach me that successful people must learn to use rules to leverage, meaning that I could first find a way to borrow 2 million, and in less than a year...

chunks.zh: 然后我假装闲聊说最多可以弄出 50 万，但是怎么保证稳赚不赔呢，要不要写什么合同，她哥就开始说股东不能有太多，到时候不好操作，你信得过我这个哥巴拉巴拉。。算了。。。后面都懒得再讲了。。。
chunks.en: Then I pretended to chat and said that I could get up to 500,000, but how can I guarantee a steady profit without loss, and should we write a contract? Her cousin began to say that there can't be too many shareholders, it will be difficult to operate at that time, you can trust me, your cousin, blah blah... Forget it... I'm too lazy to talk about the rest...

chunks.zh: 主要然后我就跟我老婆表达了我对她哥这个人人品的质疑，顺便把她表哥那个公司什么信息全部查了一遍，告诉我老婆她哥这些公司都是皮包公司，相当不靠谱，简直就是拿亲戚割韭菜，而且这个镰刀是真的带血啊。。。。
chunks.en: Mainly then I expressed my doubts about her cousin's character to my wife, and by the way, I checked all the information about her cousin's company and told my wife that her cousin's companies were shell companies, quite unreliable, simply using relatives to harvest韭菜 (jǐucài, chives, metaphor for being taken advantage of), and this sickle is really bloody...

chunks.zh: 回头我老婆竟然的把我对她哥的评价全部告诉了她哥哥（刚好那段时间我跟她吵架）....
chunks.en: In turn, my wife actually told her cousin everything I thought of him (just when I was arguing with her at that time)...

chunks.zh: 我彻底无语了，对我老婆这情商跪了，倒不是在乎她哥对我的感受。
chunks.en: I was completely speechless and knelt down to my wife's EQ, not that I cared about her brother's feelings.

chunks.zh: 我肯定无所谓，跟她哥那种人不会有什么交集，也不想有什么交集。
chunks.en: I certainly don't care, I won't have any contact with people like her brother, and I don't want to have any contact with them.

chunks.zh: 本来怎么滴都是亲戚，想着逢年过节可能还有些假装觥筹交错的局，现在好了，彻底老死不相往来了。。。
chunks.en: Originally, we were all relatives, and I thought that there might be some feigned merrymaking during festivals, but now it's good, we've completely broken off all ties...

chunks.zh: 另外，我跟我丈母娘也有过好几次的冲突，细节也懒得说了，至今我坚持我自己的观点。
chunks.en: In addition, I have had several conflicts with my mother-in-law, and I am too lazy to talk about the details. I still stick to my own views.

chunks.zh: 纵观你就是在挑刺，大老爷们心宽点，人是长辈，又是媳妇儿的爹，你不亲但不能不客气！
chunks.en: Looking at it, you're just nitpicking. As a man, be more open-minded. He's an elder and your wife's father. You may not be close, but you can't be impolite!

chunks.zh: 把聊天内容发到群里给双方父母看，我真的一想象到这个场景都两眼发黑，你老婆要是一直都这么 nt （别怪我说话直，在我这确实是这么认为的），如果没孩子，建议趁早离婚。
chunks.en: Sending chat content to the group for both parents to see, I get dizzy just imagining that scene. If your wife has always been this nt (don't blame me for speaking frankly, that's what I think), if you don't have children, I suggest getting a divorce early.

chunks.zh: 你家的矛盾根本不在于你老丈人，说白了，两代人的认知和生活习惯有差距，这是很正常的，又不住在一起，过年这几天忍忍也就过去了，你老婆才是激化矛盾的原因。
chunks.en: The conflict in your family is not actually about your father-in-law. To put it bluntly, there is a gap between the cognitive and living habits of two generations, which is very normal. You don't live together. Just bear it for these few days of the New Year. Your wife is the one who exacerbates the conflict.

chunks.zh: 你也别当好人，一点鸡毛蒜皮的小事，有啥好说的，贴子是你发的，我们也不知道你和你老婆说了啥，惹的她如此不高兴，八成是你言语之中贬低你老丈人了。
chunks.en: Don't pretend to be a good person either. What is there to say about such trivial things? You posted the post. We don't know what you said to your wife that made her so unhappy. Perhaps it was that you belittled your father-in-law in your words.

chunks.zh: 一个情商低，一个智商低，绝了。
chunks.en: One has low EQ, the other has low IQ, amazing.

chunks.zh: 一句话总结：你被人教做事的根本原因就是你在别人眼里是个弱鸡，多找找自己的原因。
chunks.en: A one-sentence summary: The fundamental reason you are being told what to do is that in the eyes of others, you are a weakling. Look for the reasons within yourself more.

chunks.zh: 你要是一年比一年牛，我不信你岳父和老婆敢比比。
chunks.en: If you are more awesome year by year, I don't believe your father-in-law and wife would dare to challenge you.

chunks.zh: 这才是真实原因，其他的都不重要。
chunks.en: This is the real reason. The others are not important.

chunks.zh: 你要是一开始就牛逼，就不会有这样一个老婆，摊上这样一个岳父。
chunks.en: If you were awesome from the beginning, you wouldn't have such a wife and such a father-in-law.

chunks.zh: @flowerfly  都是个人主观建议：作为一个男人我可以理解你岳父, 其实都是软着陆.解决矛盾.        正常人老父亲不疼女儿, 你岳父都上门委曲求全了. 不断在 cue 你. 你还是觉得你没面子. 其实按照他们那一辈的想法已经给了你台阶下了. 尊重下你岳父 也尊重下你老婆 更是尊重下你作为一个男人要组建起家庭的责任吧.       你老婆这个操作也不像他们那么说的, 什么你老婆反手去告状揭发你.不对. 其实长远看来你老婆这种反而是对的，受了欺负不找爹？不找才傻.         女人要的是一个依靠, 你可以说你老婆受不了委屈 大小姐脾气. 但是你要去解决 去引导 这是你作为一个男人的责任. 你这样激发了矛盾。如果你说你要的是大家都成熟 彼此不打扰 有边界感。那你老婆找你结婚干啥？少一口饭吃啊？       要家庭继续就去认错咯，后面不好收场.  再不济连夜过去 或者发条信息明早登门拜访解释...     评论区那些说 op 老婆有问题的 先自己结个婚？巴不得 op 妻离子散？ 十五都没过呢.
chunks.en: @flowerfly These are just personal subjective suggestions: As a man, I can understand your father-in-law, it's actually all a soft landing to resolve the conflict. A normal old father doesn't dote on his daughter, but your father-in-law has already compromised by coming to your home and constantly cueing you. You still feel like you're losing face. Actually, according to their generation's thinking, they have already given you a way out. Respect your father-in-law, respect your wife, and even more so, respect your responsibility as a man to build a family. What your wife did is not what they say, like your wife went back to accuse and expose you. That's not right. Actually, in the long run, what your wife did is right. If you're bullied, shouldn't you look for your father? It would be stupid not to. What a woman wants is a reliance. You can say that your wife can't stand being wronged and has the temper of a young lady. But you need to solve it, to guide it. This is your responsibility as a man. You have sparked conflict. If you say that you want everyone to be mature, not to disturb each other, and have a sense of boundaries, then why did your wife marry you? To have one less mouth to feed? If you want the family to continue, then admit your mistake, otherwise it will be difficult to end it later. At the very least, go over in the middle of the night, or send a message and visit to explain tomorrow morning... Those in the comments section who say that OP's wife has problems, should they get married first? Do you want OP to be divorced and separated from his wife? The fifteenth day of the first lunar month hasn't even passed yet.

chunks.zh: @cndns <……家和万事兴……家衰败三代> 贴这种对联我肯定立即撕下来。
chunks.en: @cndns I would definitely tear down that couplet immediately: <...Family harmony brings prosperity... Family decline for three generations>.

chunks.zh: 跑别人家贴对联，啥逼脸啊这么大
chunks.en: Pasting couplets at someone else's house, what kind of thick skin do you need to do that?

chunks.zh: 我觉得 op 没啥问题啊，评论区的龟龟们在这上升什么大道理呢？
chunks.en: I don't think there's anything wrong with OP. What great principles are the tortoises in the comments section trying to elevate this to?

chunks.zh: 第 1 点，迷信，强行多点菜，第 2 点，狗屎对账，狗都比它写得好，第 3 点，迷信。
chunks.en: Point 1, superstition, forcing extra dishes; Point 2, dogshit couplet, dogs write better than him; Point 3, superstition.

chunks.zh: 这件事最好的解决办法就是随它去，主动规避，能不说话就不说话就好了。
chunks.en: The best way to solve this is to let it go, take the initiative to avoid it, and don't talk if you can avoid it.

chunks.zh: 但你们不会觉得 op 的观念是不正常的吧？
chunks.en: But you don't think OP's views are abnormal, do you?

chunks.zh: 就你在中国？
chunks.en: Are you the only ones in China?

chunks.zh: 就你懂人情世故？
chunks.en: Are you the only ones who understand social interaction?

chunks.zh: op 的想法是每一个正常人都会有的想法，而作为成年人我们有的时候是“很难”把这些正常的想法说给 sb 听的，不说出来被称为情商好，说出来我觉得也没有什么，地球又不是围着你转的，为什么凡事不能我先爽呢？
chunks.en: OP's thoughts are thoughts that every normal person would have, and as adults, we sometimes find it 'difficult' to tell those normal thoughts to stupid people. Not saying it is called good EQ, but saying it is not a big deal to me. The earth doesn't revolve around you, so why can't I be happy first in everything?

chunks.zh: 何况还是和老婆私下说的。
chunks.en: Besides, it was said privately to his wife.

chunks.zh: 在我看来老婆的情商更加不够，典型的没把老公当自己人，说一句 op 不爱听的，希望别见怪，我也是有话直说，你老婆才是最恶心的。
chunks.en: In my opinion, the wife's EQ is even more insufficient. She doesn't treat her husband as her own person. I'll say something OP doesn't want to hear, I hope you don't mind, I'm just speaking my mind. Your wife is the most disgusting.

chunks.zh: 建议 op 后面可以放松些心情，它爱干嘛干嘛就好了，装看不见就好，自己待会儿找点儿好玩的也很爽。
chunks.en: I suggest that OP can relax a bit later, let it do whatever it likes, just pretend you don't see it, and find something fun to do for yourself, it's very cool.

chunks.zh: 看完之后发现 v2 的🐢男也不少，op 对岳父有意见，也没有当面和岳父吵架，也只是和老婆私下说让老婆提醒下。
chunks.en: After reading it, I found that there are quite a few turtle men on v2. OP has opinions about his father-in-law, but he didn't argue with his father-in-law face to face, and just privately told his wife to remind him.

chunks.zh: 他老婆可以不认同，但直接发群里，就很恶心了吧，竟然还要道歉。
chunks.en: His wife can disagree, but posting it directly in the group is disgusting, and he even has to apologize.

chunks.zh: 妈的就初一那天，抢我 2 个蓝，气得我饭都不想和他一起吃😡
chunks.en: Damn it, on the first day of the new year, he stole 2 of my blues, I was so angry that I didn't even want to eat with him😡

chunks.zh: @flowerfly 别把性格直当优点或者借口，你肯定不是和谁都性格直
chunks.en: @flowerfly Don't treat being straightforward as an advantage or an excuse, you're definitely not straightforward with everyone.

chunks.zh: 同学，你岳父其实问题不大，倒是你媳妇问题很大啊
chunks.en: Friend, your father-in-law is not a big problem, but your wife is a big problem.

chunks.zh: @ugpu #28 老铁，我也不是要 OP 立马像个窜天猴牛起来对吧。
chunks.en: @ugpu #28 Old buddy, I'm not asking OP to immediately become awesome like a rocket, right?

chunks.zh: 其实就是只要他岳父看到他一年比一年强，自然就不会这也教那也教了。
chunks.en: The thing is, as long as his father-in-law sees that he is stronger year by year, he will naturally stop teaching him this and that.

chunks.zh: 他现在要做的就是每年进步一些，每年比前年多赚个三五万，自然岳父和老婆就听话了。
chunks.en: What he needs to do now is to make some progress every year, earn 30,000 to 50,000 more than the year before, and naturally his father-in-law and wife will listen to him.

chunks.zh: 说白了就是他现在还不行，还总在找外因。
chunks.en: The point is that he's not good enough now and is always blaming external factors.

chunks.zh: 行有不得，反求诸己嘛
chunks.en: When things don't go as planned, look for the reason in yourself.

chunks.zh: @yqf0215 感觉楼主情商真不高，岳父过来，带着一大堆吃的，你觉得不满意，就在期间多建议老丈人、老婆到外面吃几次，你付款即可。
chunks.en: @yqf0215 I feel that the OP's EQ is really not high. When the father-in-law comes over with a lot of food, if you are dissatisfied, suggest going out to eat a few times with the father-in-law and wife during the period, and you pay for it.

chunks.zh: 同时，需要保持对老丈人的感谢。
chunks.en: At the same time, you need to maintain your gratitude to the father-in-law.

chunks.zh: 这样，老丈人、老婆都得不会有意见。
chunks.en: That way, the father-in-law and wife will not have any opinions.

chunks.zh: 如果老丈人觉得外面吃浪费钱，你受不了老丈人带的食物，那就自己偷偷带着老婆到外面打牙祭，家里留给老丈人自己吃就是了。。。
chunks.en: If the father-in-law feels that eating out is a waste of money and you can't stand the food that the father-in-law brought, then secretly take your wife out to eat, and leave the food at home for the father-in-law to eat by himself...

chunks.zh: 如果你收入不高，承担不了顿顿外面吃的费用，那就自己加班，自己到单位食堂解决，或者自己加个班，自己弄一顿麦当劳或者买个外卖就行了。
chunks.en: If your income is not high and you can't afford every meal outside, then work overtime, go to the company cafeteria to eat, or work overtime and get some McDonald's or buy a takeout.

chunks.zh: 楼主的老丈人希望改变楼主，但楼主也是在改变老丈人啊，这就矛盾了。
chunks.en: The OP's father-in-law wants to change the OP, but the OP is also changing the father-in-law, which is a contradiction.

chunks.zh: 你的老婆把你聊天记录发到群里是不成熟，楼主希望改变老丈人，也是不成熟。。。
chunks.en: It is immature for your wife to send your chat history to the group, and it is also immature for the OP to want to change the father-in-law...

chunks.zh: 楼主种种原因，自己不做饭菜或者条件不允许自己做饭菜，也许你觉得难吃的同时，那些饭菜你老婆却吃得津津有味。。。
chunks.en: For various reasons, the OP does not cook or the conditions do not allow him to cook. Maybe you think the food is unpalatable, but your wife eats it with relish...

chunks.zh: 你嫌弃老丈人的饭菜做的不合意，是最蠢的做法。
chunks.en: It is the stupidest thing to dislike your father-in-law's cooking.

chunks.zh: @HUZHUANGZHUANG 不知你是什么时候树立起来种唯金钱论的，身材高大就不会得病，富豪明星他们的婚姻一定处处和谐，是这样子吗？
chunks.en: @HUZHUANGZHUANG I don't know when you established this kind of money-centric theory. If you are tall and strong, you won't get sick. The marriages of rich people and celebrities must be harmonious everywhere, is that so?

chunks.zh: 你媳妇问题最大。。
chunks.en: Your wife is the biggest problem...

chunks.zh: op 你应该问的是一个处理方式.   很简单. 不离婚 想家庭能继续走下去.就一个方式.     1: 一个满意的结果 家庭能继续下去 有点矛盾没什么 主要是解决 你去认错 和你老婆 和你岳父，岳父明事理自我检讨觉得现在年轻人的边界感强 笑嘻嘻和你说没事. 当然 也有可能得寸进尺.但是这种概率应该很低.     2: 不去认错 硬气到底 顶多离婚咯, 随着时间其中一方醒悟 减少往来 反正你和你老婆过日子无非就是这个事儿一旦以后有事就开始膈应你.膈应你老婆.当然也有可能随着时间其他事下一代的出生忘得一干而尽.     3: 你觉得丢人，要面子. 你爸出面咯, 教训下你 也点播下你老丈人.  @flowerfly
chunks.en: OP, you should be asking about a way to handle this. It's very simple. If you don't want a divorce and want the family to continue, there's only one way: 1: A satisfactory outcome. The family can continue. There's a bit of a contradiction, but mainly you need to resolve it. You go and admit your mistake to your wife and your father-in-law. Your father-in-law is sensible and self-reflects, thinking that young people nowadays have a strong sense of boundaries, and says it's okay with a grin. Of course, it's also possible that he'll take an inch, but that probability is very low. 2: Don't admit your mistake, be tough to the end, at most get a divorce. Over time, one of the two parties wakes up and reduces contact. Anyway, all you and your wife are doing is getting on each other's nerves once something happens. Of course, it's also possible that other things, the birth of the next generation, will erase everything over time. 3: You feel ashamed, you want face. Your dad steps in, teaches you a lesson, and also gives your father-in-law a hint. @flowerfly

chunks.zh: @ugpu #31 你说的对，但是他的处理方式已经体现了不懂人性，所以我提都不提。
chunks.en: @ugpu #31 You're right, but his handling of things already shows that he doesn't understand human nature, so I don't even mention it.

chunks.zh: 最简单的就是钱，过年给老婆花钱买点金饰，给岳父岳母一万块钱过年。
chunks.en: The simplest thing is money. Spend money on some gold jewelry for your wife during the New Year, and give your father-in-law and mother-in-law 10,000 yuan for the New Year.

chunks.zh: 保证他们一个屁都不放。
chunks.en: I guarantee they won't say a word.

chunks.zh: 毕竟，吃人嘴软，拿人手短嘛。
chunks.en: After all, you can't bite the hand that feeds you.

chunks.zh: @daodao 呃，你老婆是真的...NB 。
chunks.en: @daodao Uh, your wife is really... amazing.

chunks.zh: 一般越是底层出身的娃，越不懂人情世故，也不懂社会运行的逻辑。
chunks.en: Generally, the more low-class a child's background is, the less they understand social interactions, and the less they understand the logic of how society works.

chunks.zh: 别说家衰败三代还真没有错，只不过这对仗我相信你岳父是教体育的。
chunks.en: Don't say that the decline of the family for three generations is really not wrong, but I believe your father-in-law teaches P.E.
